verses.verse: Forasmuch <S%G1895><s%> as many <S%G4183><s%> have taken in hand <S%G2021><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to set forth in order <S%G392><s%> <S%G5664><s%> a declaration <S%G1335><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> those things <S%G4229><s%> which are most surely believed <S%G4135><s%> <S%G5772><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>,

Havahn <S%G2531><s%> as they delivered <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5627><s%> them unto us <S%G2254><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> eyewitnesses <S%G845><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ministers <S%G5257><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%>;

It seemed <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5656><s%> good to me also <S%G2504><s%>, having had perfect <S%G199><s%> understanding <S%G3877><s%> <S%G5761><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%> from the very first <S%G509><s%>, to write <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> in order <S%G2517><s%>, most excellent <S%G2903><s%> Theophilus <S%G2321><s%>,

That <S%G2443><s%> thou mightest know <S%G1921><s%> <S%G5632><s%> the certainty <S%G803><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> those things <S%G3056><s%>, wherein <S%G3739><s%> thou hast been instructed <S%G2727><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

There was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Herod <S%G2264><s%>, the king <S%G935><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%>, a certain <S%G5100><s%> Kohen <S%G2409><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Z'kharyah-yahu <S%G2197><s%>, of <S%G1537><s%> the course <S%G2183><s%> of Abia <S%G7><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> was of <S%G1537><s%> the daughters <S%G2364><s%> of Aharon <S%G2><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was Elisheva <S%G1665><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> both <S%G297><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, walking <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Mitzvot <S%G1785><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ordinances <S%G1345><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> blameless <S%G273><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> child <S%G5043><s%>, because <S%G2530><s%> that Elisheva <S%G1665><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> barren <S%G4723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> both <S%G297><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> now well stricken <S%G4260><s%> <S%G5761><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> years <S%G2250><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, that while <S%G1722><s%> he <S%G846><s%> executed the Kohen's office <S%G2407><s%> <S%G5721><s%> before <S%G1725><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> course <S%G2183><s%>,

According <S%G2596><s%> to the custom <S%G1485><s%> of the Kohen's office <S%G2405><s%>, his lot <S%G2975><s%> <S%G5627><s%> was to burn incense <S%G2370><s%> <S%G5658><s%> when he went <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when Z'kharyah-yahu <S%G2197><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> him, he was troubled <S%G5015><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> <S%G5627><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall drink <S%G4095><s%> <S%G5632><s%> neither <S%G3364><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> strong drink <S%G4608><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he shall be filled <S%G4130><s%> <S%G5701><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, even <S%G2089><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb <S%G2836><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Z'kharyah-yahu <S%G2197><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%>, Whereby <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5101><s%> shall I know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5695><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> an old man <S%G4246><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> well stricken <S%G4260><s%> <S%G5761><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> years <S%G2250><s%> <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, thou <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> shalt be dumb <S%G4623><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5658><s%>, until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> shall be performed <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5638><s%>, because <S%G473><s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou believest <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> shall be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5701><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> season <S%G2540><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he came out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, he could <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5711><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they perceived <S%G1921><s%> <S%G5627><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5758><s%> a vision <S%G3701><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%>: for <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> beckoned <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G1269><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> remained <S%G1265><s%> <S%G5707><s%> speechless <S%G2974><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, that, as soon as <S%G5613><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> ministration <S%G3009><s%> were accomplished <S%G4130><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, he departed <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.

<S%G3754><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> hath <S%G4160><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> dealt <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5758><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> wherein <S%G3739><s%> he looked on <S%G1896><s%> <S%G5627><s%> me, to take away <S%G851><s%> <S%G5629><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> reproach <S%G3681><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G444><s%>.
